Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 4 Āsavagocchaka, Kusalattika » 4.6 Āsavavippayuttasāsavaduka, Kusalattika » 4.6.1 Kusalapada
Hetu
Āsavagocchaka, Kusalattika
Āsavavippayuttasāsavaduka, Kusalattika
Kusalapada
Hetu
48.
1682Āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto anāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (2) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
49.
1683Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve…pe…  avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1684(Sahajātavāropi…pe…  pañhāvāropi vitthāretabbo.)
